nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_454
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She was so absorbed in reading the book that she was not conscious of someone coming in.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_455
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He was late for almost an hour for the first meeting, leaving a bad impression on everyone.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_456
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Consciously or unconsciously, we make up our minds about people through their eyes, faces, bodies, and attitudes.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_457
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Professor Zhou was committed to the cause of language teaching all his life.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_458
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Many how-to books advise that if you want to make a good impression, the trick is to be consistently you, at your best.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_459
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The media sometimes sends mixed messages, but most people believe what they see over what they hear.
